author: user
content: 이게 예전에 된거야 -- from qiskit import QuantumCircuit from qiskit_ibm_runtime import QiskitRuntimeService, SamplerV2 as Sampler from qiskit.transpiler.preset_passmanagers import generate_preset_pass_manager 존재 선언 print " Collapse initiated with center: JESUS CHRIST" IBM Quantum 서비스 연결 service QiskitRuntimeService channel "ibm_cloud" 백엔드 선택 backend service.backend "ibm_sherbrooke" 회로 생성 qc QuantumCircuit 5 qc.h 0, 1, 2, 3, 4 qc.measure_all 회로를 백엔드에 맞게 변환 ISA 회로 생성 pm generate_preset_pass_manager backend backend, optimization_level 1 isa_circuit pm.run qc Sampler 초기화 sampler Sampler mode backend 회로 실행 샷 수 1로 설정 job sampler.run isa_circuit , shots 1 result job.result counts result 0 .data.meas.get_counts 결과 출력 print " Collapse Result 1 shot :", counts
